a.title: Learn more about Mosinee School District
a.span: Go to Mosinee School District Information

span.i: WelcomeStudents, Parents, Families, Friends, and Staff!

p.i: Welcome to the Mosinee School District. Thank you for visiting our site. The various links across the top of the page will help you navigate.

ul.li: Improve student progress academically and socially preparing them to be productive members of a multicultural society.
Promote partnerships with the community to create multiple opportunities for learning.
Foster life-long learners who are self-motivated with adaptability for future change.

p.span: Tomorrow starts locker item pickup for all 3 schools from 8-11am and 3-6pm all week (AM only on Friday). For high school pick up, enter the...

div.a: Social Media Pages

div.p: The Mosinee School District has created a page to share information on the Coronavirus. We will continue to monitor and update information as it becomes available to us.

a.span: Read more on COVID 19 Updates and Resources

div.p: Calling all teachers and/or administrators that want to learn about starting and running a FabLabwithin their school. Monday through Friday, June 22-26, 2020 or July 20-24, 2020 in Mosinee, Wisconsin! More information can be found here. Sign up to join us here.
